pipelines.name: pcb_anomaly_detection_mlops
pipelines.pipeline: multifilesrc loop=TRUE location=/home/pipeline-server/resources/videos/anomalib_pcb_test.avi name=source ! h264parse ! decodebin3 ! gvaclassify name=classification inference-region=full-frame device=CPU model-instance-id=inst0 ! queue ! gvafpscounter ! appsink name=destination

pipelines.name: pcb_anomaly_detection_mqtt
pipelines.pipeline: {auto_source} name=source ! decodebin3 ! gvaclassify name=classification inference-region=full-frame device=CPU model-instance-id=inst0 ! queue ! gvametaconvert add-empty-results=true name=metaconvert ! queue ! gvawatermark ! gvafpscounter ! queue ! jpegenc ! appsink name=destination

pipelines.name: pcb_anomaly_detection_s3write
pipelines.pipeline: {auto_source} name=source ! decodebin3 ! gvaclassify name=classification inference-region=full-frame device=CPU model-instance-id=inst0 ! queue ! gvafpscounter ! queue ! jpegenc ! appsink name=destination

pipelines.name: pcb_anomaly_detection_opcua
pipelines.pipeline: {auto_source} name=source ! decodebin3 ! gvaclassify name=classification inference-region=full-frame device=CPU model-instance-id=inst0 ! queue ! gvametaconvert add-empty-results=true name=metaconvert ! queue ! gvawatermark ! gvafpscounter ! queue ! jpegenc ! appsink name=destination

pipelines.name: pcb_anomaly_detection_gpu
pipelines.pipeline: {auto_source} name=source ! decodebin3 ! gvaclassify inference-region=full-frame device=GPU model-instance-id=instgpu0 inference-interval=1 batch-size=8 nireq=2 ie-config="GPU_THROUGHPUT_STREAMS=2" name=classification ! queue ! gvametaconvert add-empty-results=true name=metaconvert ! queue ! gvafpscounter ! appsink name=destination

pipelines.name: pcb_anomaly_detection_npu
pipelines.pipeline: {auto_source} name=source ! decodebin3 ! gvaclassify inference-region=full-frame device=NPU model-instance-id=instnpu0 inference-interval=1 batch-size=1 nireq=4 name=classification ! queue ! gvametaconvert add-empty-results=true name=metaconvert ! queue ! gvafpscounter ! appsink name=destination

pipelines.pipeline: {auto_source} name=source ! decodebin3 ! gvaclassify inference-region=full-frame device=CPU model-instance-id=inst0 name=classification ! queue ! gvametaconvert add-empty-results=true name=metaconvert ! queue ! gvafpscounter ! appsink name=destination
